resources.string: The purpose of this app is to assist coaches and spectators of cross country and track races to take splits of multiple runners at the same time.
Press the start button to start or continue the main timer.
Press pause or stop to pause the timer.
Press restart to restart the timer.
Press the add button located in the bottom left to add a runner.

Long click the runnerâ€™s name to edit or delete the runner.

Press split to take the split of the runner.

Press stop to end the timer on the runner and take the final split.

Press the button that says last split to review the splits taken for the runner.
